title: E-Car sales fall to 5-month low in February despite steep price cuts
description: Electric car sales in India fell to their lowest level in five months in February despite price cuts. Lower acquisition cost alone is not enough to encourage buyers to shift to EVs. The government's FAME India scheme is set to end soon and may lead to further sales slowdown.
